column4: Ok, found out the scoop on 1.5 (which some of you may already know): "Well, beryl 0.2.0-beta1 (formerly known as 0.1.5) is going to be out shortly. We know its going to be a bit buggy, but we hope by releasing a beta, we can get a cleaner rc out without sacrificing features, because with a beta we will get more than just in-house/some svn testing."
